name: PlayHome
description:
PlayHome (プレイホーム in Japanese) is an eroge created by the Japanese H-game company Illusion. The game was released on October 13, 2017.
The game focuses on destroying a whole family of the guy who once accused the main character as a molester. Following previous play/rape (プレイ/レイプ) series from Illusion, the game illuminates dark atmosphere and may not be appropriate for certain audiences.
